Key: (Sorry, Reine-san. I... can't pick up the phone.)
(I'm making Kotori a priority here.)
Was that okay...?

Yeah. You finally spoke your mind. All I want
is to be with you right now, Kotori.
Shido...

Kotori, you're not alone anymore. I won't
let you.

Same here... Shido, I'll make sure you're
never alone.

(We hugged each other tightly. By doing so,
it felt like we were communicating on a deeper
level.)

(Since then, our relationship changed. Not
drastically. But it reaffirmed our sibling
closeness. I was her brother, she was my sister.)

(However, though we never said it aloud,
something changed inside of us. So long as
Kotori's beside me, it'll never die.)
Hey, Shido.
Hm?
What should we do now?
Hm. Look at the time. We could eat dinner.

I'll treat you to a deluxe fast food meal since
you love it so much.
YAY! Just what I wanted, Shido!
But that doesn't tickle my fancy anymore.
Haha. Fair enough. We could get something else.
On second thought, I'll eat it.
You're never honest with yourself.

What? Besides, what if people see me scarfing
it down?
I mean, who cares what you eat, Kotori?
Wh-What are you saying?!
Hahaha...

(It was a peaceful time. I don't know what
happened, but no more Spirits appeared.)

(Ratatoskr accomplished its mission and was
disbanded. Kotori withdrew from her post.)

(Which meant we had more time for ourselves.
All the fun and chaotic memories faded away,
and soon years had passed...)
(At last, we had time for ourselves.)
Hey, Shido?
Yeah?
Are you happy?
Of course I am.
Ah, glad to hear it.
What the heck? Why do you ask?
Oh? Feeling curious?
Yes, I am.
Then, let me explain...

(Honestly, it didn't matter. All that mattered
was that we were happy.)
We'll always be together.
